nodes.title: Some quick build fixes for ios10
Bug fix while accessing direct values
Fix listenForAuth using incorrect base class methods
Added startAt() and fixed endAt() on Android
added support for signInWithCustomToken on ios.
Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
update readme to show no longer maintain
Fix crash that happens when Firebase API key gets revoked
match android's firebase version with gms-play-services
[fix #321] Fixes the crash when the user opens the app while offline
Fix blank code / message due to wrong variable names
Add settings.gradle info for Android install
Corrections in docs, auth and database subscription bug fixes for iOS/Android
Add podspec and fix iOS database null pointer
Add error callback for database .on handler (matches Web spec)
[v3] Fixed iOS headers to support React Native 0.40
[v3] forEach returns now child snapshot like Web SDK
[v3] Fixed bug in deepGet that returned wrong result
[v3] Always return from 'push' with callback / promise
[v3] Fix getToken to return JWT token instead of user
[v3] Add option 'persistence' and make setPersistence internal
Made setPersistence internal and added option 'persistence'
Consistency with values emitted by firebase.auth.AuthProvider subclasses
Fix upload for empty url string
update manual install doc in README.md
Add missing exportVal function to DataSnapshot.
Maintain similar response format for getCurrentUser and signInWith*
Readme link to firebase.google.com not firebase.com
Change to Fix breaking window object
fix for issue 69, missing downloadUrl property from file upload response on iOS
Fix possible Null Pointer Exception when logging an event on Android
Don't hard set Android play services version #134
Fix .equalTo, .endAt, and .startAt filters when used without key.
Use storage url from .plist file if not setStorageUrl() hasn't been called
forEach and map method on the DataSnapshot does not retain key
Fixed typo which caused an error in FirestackAuth
Immutable database references, listeners fixes, fix build
Parity of response format between ios and android.
Fix Android listenForAuth method to correctly check for user
Parity of response format between ios and android
Remove auth methods from instance root & update documentation
Add the ranking best practice strategy
Fix for exceptions thrown by Firebase
Fix auth user and user map
Stop passing getApplicationContext() in to the constructor
Add instruction to update pods to README
Adding missing user info mapping to getUserMap (Android)
Fixed provider google on Android (was missing)
Android fixes - convert firebase longs to doubles, implement ServerValue.TIMESTAMP
Allow removal of specific callbacks from query listeners
Allow non-modular headers to be included
Change asset upload to use data rather than file
Correctly send database_error event on iOS
Fix startAt, endAt, equalTo optional 2nd param for Android getDatabaseQueryAtPathAndModifiers
Fix startAt, endAt, equalTo optional 2nd params on Android
